title: Thomas
description: The third of three gripping prequels to The Deptford Mice, now available as an audio tape that will enthrall and delight. Read by Richard Griffiths.It is four years since the fall of Jupiter, but upon the Cutty Sark all is far from well. Thomas Triton, midshipmouse, is tormented by horrific visions of the past; of stormlashed seas, ferocious battles, lost cities and terrifying heathen gods.But now the time has come to confront the most chilling memory of his youth and a dark, dreadful secret.
author: Robin Jarvis
